title: Pixel 3 camera massive lens flare issue / orange skin tone on indoor shooting
content:
Hi There,
On Feb 14 I purchased a brand new Google Pixel 3.
Since day 1 I encountered 2 major issues with the camera:

1. Many photos come out with a massive lens flare signs. Examples:


2. Under indoor light shooting, body skin is orange and colors seems to be unreal. Examples:


There are many other photos with same issues (if you need more examples).

Besides, I have some other issues with speaker (no one can hear me on speaker within a phone call),
Screen brightness that changes suddenly to almost black screen,
and some other minor issues.

I have to say that I am really disappointed from the Pixel 3. I thought it's one of the best smartphones in the market, but the truth is that this phone is full of issues (Maybe I mistakenly got a defected product, and maybe this is a wider issue).

I'd be happy to get some help with this,
Omri Cohen
